trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> is an HTTP module which is used to secure an ASP.NET application by enforcing federated authentication settings on incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> 是 HTTP 模組，會藉由強制執行連入要求的聯合驗證設定，用來保護 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> is the main module that WIF offers out of the box for handling claims-based identity access in ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> 是 WIF 現成提供的主要模組，用於處理 ASP.NET 應用程式中的宣告式識別存取。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> raises several events, which allows ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" />會引發數個事件，它可讓 ASP.NET 開發人員變更預設行為，並控制驗證和宣告處理發生方式的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> functionality is divided into task-specific methods.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" />功能會分為特定工作的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> class implements an HTTP module known as the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>類別會實作 HTTP 模組已知 WS-同盟驗證模組 (WSFAM)。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM is implemented out of the box by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF).
trans-unit.target: Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 時，會立即可用的實作 WSFAM。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM is added to the ASP.NET pipeline by making an entry in the web.config file.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 是 web.config 檔案中建立一個項目新增至 ASP.NET 管線。

trans-unit.source: It derives from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase>, which implements <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>.
trans-unit.target: 它衍生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase>，它會實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>。

trans-unit.source: It registers with the ASP.NET runtime to listen for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: 它會接聽的 ASP.NET 執行階段註冊<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>和<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。

trans-unit.source: Listening to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event, lets the WSFAM redirect clients to a security token service (STS) to obtain a security token when authorization fails on a requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 接聽<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件，可讓用戶端重新導向至安全性權杖服務 (STS) 取得安全性權杖時所需資源上的授權失敗 WSFAM。

trans-unit.source: Listening to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event enables the WSFAM to monitor HTTP requests for a response from the STS that contains the requested token.
trans-unit.target: 接聽<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件可讓來監視 HTTP 要求的回應包含要求的語彙基元從 STS WSFAM。

trans-unit.source: When such a token is present and valid, it creates an instance of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> for the authenticated user using the claims that are present in the token.
trans-unit.target: 當此權杖是存在且有效時，它會建立的執行個體<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>已驗證的使用者使用的權杖中的宣告。

trans-unit.source: When using the WSFAM, session management is provided by a session authentication module (SAM), which is an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> class, or a class derived from it.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段管理使用 WSFAM，當工作階段驗證模組 (SAM)，也就是執行個體所提供的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>從它衍生的類別或類別。

trans-unit.source: The SAM is also added to the ASP.NET pipeline in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: SAM 也會加入至組態檔中的 ASP.NET 管線。

trans-unit.source: The SAM monitors requests for authentication (session) cookies.
trans-unit.target: SAM 監視 （工作階段） 的驗證 cookie 的要求。

trans-unit.source: When these cookies are present and valid, the module extracts the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> for the authenticated user from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> and sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the thread principal <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 當這些 cookie 確實存在且有效時，此模組會將擷取<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>已驗證的使用者從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>並設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性和執行緒主體<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM provides:
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 提供：

trans-unit.source: The ability for an ASP.NET application to outsource authentication to a security token service (STS) by using the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式將驗證外包給安全性權杖服務 (STS) 所使用的 WS-同盟通訊協定功能。

trans-unit.source: Identity can be federated across one or more identity realms and involve multiple STSs.
trans-unit.target: 可以跨一個或多個身分識別領域同盟身分識別，並且包含多個 Sts。

trans-unit.source: Claims-based identity for ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的宣告型識別。

trans-unit.source: During authentication, the WSFAM builds a principal from the claims in the security token sent by the STS and sets this claims principal as the thread principal.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證期間，WSFAM 建置從 STS 所傳送的安全性權杖中宣告的主體，並將這個宣告主體設定為主要執行緒。

trans-unit.source: You can then use this principal to make further authorization, presentation, and logic decisions about the user it represents in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您接著可以使用這個主體進行進一步授權、 展示和邏輯來判斷它所代表的使用者程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM exposes several properties that provide default message parameters to use on WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 會公開一些提供預設来使用的 WS-同盟登入和登出要求的訊息參數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: These properties are typically initialized from the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性通常初始化自[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The most important of these properties are:
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的最重要的是：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property, which specifies the address of the security token service (STS) to which to send WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>屬性，指定要將 WS-同盟登入和登出要求傳送至安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Realm%2A> property, which specifies the wtrealm parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Realm%2A>屬性，指定要使用的 wtrealm 參數在 WS-同盟登入要求。

trans-unit.source: The wtrealm parameter identifies the security realm of the relying party (RP) application to the STS.
trans-unit.target: Wtrealm 參數識別要 STS 的信賴憑證者 (rp) 應用程式的安全性領域。

trans-unit.source: Sign-in message parameters can also be changed on a per-request basis by providing an event-handler delegate for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 登入訊息參數也可以變更每個要求為基礎所提供的事件處理常式委派<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件。

trans-unit.source: Two properties control the behavior of the module.
trans-unit.target: 兩個屬性會控制行為的模組。

trans-unit.source: Both of these properties are also typically initialized from the `<wsFederation>` element in configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個屬性通常也初始化自`<wsFederation>`組態中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.PassiveRedirectEnabled%2A> property specifies whether the module should perform passive redirects to the STS for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.PassiveRedirectEnabled%2A>屬性會指定模組是否應該執行被動重新導向至 STS 進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects%2A> property specifies whether sessions should be persistent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects%2A>屬性會指定工作階段是否應為永久性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set true, the SAM is used to write a session cookie to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為 true，SAM 用來寫入至用戶端工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent requests from the client, the SAM provides authentication by using the token persisted in the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 在後續要求中從用戶端，SAM 會提供使用語彙基元驗證保存在工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM raises several events during sign-in and sign-out, which allow ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior of the module and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 引發多個事件期間登入和登出，這可讓 ASP.NET 開發人員變更模組的預設行為，以及控制如何驗證和處理宣告進行的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The following events are raised before the WS-Federation sign-in request is sent to the STS:
trans-unit.target: WS-同盟登入要求傳送至 STS 前，會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed>: Raised when passive redirect is enabled and authorization fails on a requested resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed>： 當被動式重新導向已啟用，且授權失敗要求的資源上引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>: Raised just before the WSFAM sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the STS.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>： 之前引發 WSFAM 會傳送至 STS WS-同盟登入要求。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to change the parameters in the sign-in request.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更登入要求中的參數，您可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: The following events are raised when a sign-in response (issued security token) is received from the STS:
trans-unit.target: 從 STS 收到登入回應 （發出安全性權杖） 時，會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenReceived>: Raised just after the security token sent by the STS is read from the response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenReceived>： 只在 STS 所傳送的安全性語彙基元讀取回應之後，才引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenValidated>: Raised just after the token has been validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenValidated>： 只在已驗證權杖之後，才引發。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to filter, transform, or add claims to the claims principal (<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>) created from the security token.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來篩選或轉換，將宣告新增至宣告主體 (<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>) 所建立的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>: Raised just before the session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) created from the claims principal is used to set the thread principal and current user and is written to the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>： 引發之前工作階段權杖 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) 主要用來設定執行緒主體的宣告和目前的使用者來建立並寫入工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Gives you an opportunity to modify the session token or enable or disable writing the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您有機會修改的工作階段權杖或啟用或停用寫入工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedIn>: Raised at the end of the authentication just after the thread principal and current user have been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedIn>： 在結束時引發的驗證之後已設定執行緒主體與目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignInError>: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignInError>： 引發登入期間發生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the request and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消要求，並避免例外狀況傳回給呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: When signing out of a session or when processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (wsignoutcleanup1.0), the following events are raised:
trans-unit.target: 當簽章登出工作階段，或處理 WS-同盟登出清除要求 (wsignoutcleanup1.0) 時，會引發下列事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SigningOut>: Raised just before the session is deleted to enable you to perform any cleanup that might depend on the session or to cancel sign-out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SigningOut>： 只在工作階段中刪除，讓您執行任何可能相依於工作階段的清除，或取消登出之前引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedOut>: Raised just after the session has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedOut>： 只在已刪除工作階段之後，才引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOutError>: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-out. You can cancel sign-out and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOutError>： 引發登出期間發生的例外狀況。您可以取消登出，並避免例外狀況傳回給呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: The sign-out events are not raised when signing out at the STS by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.FederatedSignOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 登出在 STS 藉由呼叫時，不會引發登出事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.FederatedSignOut%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of signing in to an STS using WSFAM.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種登入使用 WSFAM STS。

trans-unit.source: The first is by enabling passive redirects through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.PassiveRedirectEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個是藉由啟用透過被動重新導向<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.PassiveRedirectEnabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this case, when authorization fails on a requested resource, rather than returning a `401:Access Denied` response to the client, WSFAM builds a WS-Federation sign-in request message from its properties and redirects the client to the STS to retrieve a security token.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，當授權失敗要求的資源，而不是傳回`401:Access Denied`回應給用戶端，WSFAM 建置其內容的 WS-同盟登入要求訊息，並將用戶端重新導向至 STS，以擷取安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The second way is to explicitly redirect the client to the STS by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignIn%2A> method from a web page or custom control in your application.
trans-unit.target: 第二種方式是明確地將對 STS 的用戶端重新導向藉由呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignIn%2A>來自網頁或應用程式中的自訂控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignIn%2A> method also uses the properties of the WSFAM to construct the sign-in request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignIn%2A>方法也使用 WSFAM 屬性來建構登入要求。

trans-unit.source: Any of the overloaded <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> methods can be used to sign out of the session.
trans-unit.target: 任何多載<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法可用來登出工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This deletes the session cookie on the client.
trans-unit.target: 這會刪除用戶端上的工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: It does not send a WS-Federation sign-out message ("wsignout1.0") to the STS.
trans-unit.target: 它不會傳送至 STS WS-同盟登出訊息 (「 wsignout1.0")。

trans-unit.source: To sign-out at the STS, you must use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.FederatedSignOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要登出在 STS，您必須使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.FederatedSignOut%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM handles WS-Federation sign-out clean-up requests ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), by deleting its session with the client.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 會藉由使用用戶端刪除其工作階段處理 WS-同盟登出清除要求 (「 wsignoutcleanup1.0")。

trans-unit.source: If the wreply parameter in the sign-out clean-up message is not set, the WSFAM returns an image of a green check mark to the STS that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定 wreply 訊息中的參數登出清除，WSFAM 傳送訊息的 STS 傳回綠色的核取記號的映像。

trans-unit.source: This feature can be used by an STS as an acknowledgment that the RP has completed its sign-out.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能可供 STS，以完成其登出 RP 通知的形式。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM exposes its functionality -- for example, its request processing pipeline -- through several task-specific methods.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 會公開其功能-例如，其要求處理管線-透過數個特定工作的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can override these methods in derived classes to alter the behavior of the WSFAM.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這些方法，以變更 WSFAM 行為衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: To be used, the module must be added to the pipeline as in the following XML:
trans-unit.target: 要使用此模組必須加入至管線，如下列 XML 所示：

trans-unit.source: Once configured, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> raises events at various stages of processing an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 一旦設定，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>處理 HTTP 要求的各個階段引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET developers can handle these events in the global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 開發人員可以處理這些事件在 global.asax 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Called by constructors in derived classes to initialize the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別的建構函式呼叫，以初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the wauth parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests ("wsignin1.0").
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 WS-同盟登入要求 ("wsignin1.0") 中使用的 wauth 參數值。

trans-unit.source: A URI that specifies the authentication type.
trans-unit.target: 指定驗證類型的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The wauth parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: Wauth 參數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A> property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wauth parameter is not included in the sign-in request.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A>屬性設定為`null`或登入要求中未包含空字串，wauth 參數。

trans-unit.source: You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由新增的處理常式覆寫這項設定在每個 HTTP 要求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message.
trans-unit.target: 只在模組重新導向至與 WS-同盟登入要求訊息的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 之前，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The STS is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所指定 STS<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the module is determining whether it should redirect the user to the configured issuer to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 當模組正在判斷它是否應該將使用者重新導向至已設定的簽發者進行驗證時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed> event is raised when authorization has failed for an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed>授權失敗的 HTTP 要求時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: It is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnEndRequest%2A> event-handler delegate through a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnAuthorizationFailed%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 會引發此事件於<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnEndRequest%2A>透過呼叫事件處理常式委派<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnAuthorizationFailed%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to control whether the request is redirected to the identity provider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，即可控制是否已重新導向至識別提供者。

trans-unit.source: The framework initializes this property to `false` if the user has already been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 架構會初始化此屬性為`false`如果使用者已經過驗證。

trans-unit.source: In this case, setting the property to `true` may cause a circular loop with the STS.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將屬性設定為`true`與 STS 可能會造成循環迴圈。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event can be used to modify the URL or cancel the redirect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件可用來修改 URL 或取消重新導向。

trans-unit.source: To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method named `WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed` in the global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理這個 ASP.NET 應用程式中的事件，建立名為方法`WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed`global.asax 檔中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified HTTP request is a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出指定的 HTTP 要求是否為 WS-Federation 登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the message is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), this method processes the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息是 WS-同盟登出清除訊息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")，這個方法會處理該要求。

trans-unit.source: A sign-in response message is sent to the relying party (RP) by a security token service (STS) in response to a sign-in request message.
trans-unit.target: 登入回應訊息會傳送至信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP)，以回應登入要求訊息安全性權杖服務 (STS)。

trans-unit.source: The incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 連入的 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified HTTP request is a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出指定的 HTTP 要求是否為 WS-Federation 登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the message is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), this method processes the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息是 WS-同盟登出清除訊息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")，這個方法會處理該要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified HTTP request contains a form POST in which the wa parameter is set to "wsignout1.0" and the wresult parameter is not empty; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 HTTP 要求包含表單 POST，其中 wa 參數設定為 "wsignout1.0"，而且 wresult 參數不是空的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a FORM post that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從傳入的 HTTP 要求包含 WS-同盟登入回應訊息的表單張貼要求處理管線叫用。

trans-unit.source: It invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload with the `onPage` parameter set `false` to indicate that the call did not originate while processing a page.
trans-unit.target: 它會叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載`onPage`參數集`false`表示處理網頁時，不是呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 連入的 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the call originates while processing a page request.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理網頁要求時會產生呼叫，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the caller is an HTTP module.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端是 HTTP 模組，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter determines how to terminate processing or send redirects if the incoming message is a WS-Federation sign-out cleanup message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0").
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會決定如何結束處理或傳送重新導向，如果內送訊息是 WS-同盟登出清除訊息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified HTTP request is a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出指定的 HTTP 要求是否為 WS-Federation 登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the message is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), this method processes the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息是 WS-同盟登出清除訊息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")，這個方法會處理該要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified HTTP request contains a FORM post in which the wa parameter is set to "wsignout1.0" and the wresult parameter is not empty; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 HTTP 要求包含表單 POST，其中 wa 參數設定為 "wsignout1.0"，而且 wresult 參數不是空的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a form POST that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用要求處理管線，透過從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載，以便判斷連入 HTTP 要求是否為表單 POST 包含 WS-同盟登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation performs the following:
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會執行下列作業：

trans-unit.source: If the incoming request is a form POST, it calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.IsSignInResponse%2A> method to determine whether the form POST contains a sign-in response.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送要求的表單 POST，它會呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.IsSignInResponse%2A>方法來判斷表單 POST 是否包含登入回應。

trans-unit.source: If the incoming request is not a form POST, and the request contains a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (the wa parameter is "wsignoutcleanup1.0"), sign-out clean-up is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果連入要求的表單 POST，而且未要求包含 WS-同盟登出清除要求 （wa 參數會是"wsignoutcleanup1.0"），則會執行登出清除。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOut%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is invoked (with the parameter set to `true` to indicate a sign-out clean-up) to sign out of the session.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOut%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>叫用方法時 (以將參數設定為`true`指出登出清除) 登出工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This also causes the sign-out events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 這也會導致引發登出的事件。

trans-unit.source: Next, if the sign-out clean-up request contains a wreply parameter, the client is redirected to the URL returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSignOutRedirectUrl%2A> method; otherwise, an image of a green check mark is returned to the STS.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，如果登出清除要求包含 wreply 參數，用戶端重新導向至所傳回的 URL<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSignOutRedirectUrl%2A>方法; 否則會對 STS 傳回綠色的核取記號的映像。

trans-unit.source: The receipt of this image can be used by the STS as a confirmation that the sign-out clean-up request was received and successfully processed by the RP.
trans-unit.target: 此映像的回條可以當做 sts 登出清除要求已接收並已順利處理 RP 所確認的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM saves this value in the wctx parameter in the WS-Federation sign in request; however, the module does not use it when processing sign-in requests or sign-in responses.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 會將這個值儲存在 WS-同盟登入要求中的 wctx 參數，但是模組不會在處理登入要求或登入回應時使用該值。

trans-unit.source: You can set it to any value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將它設定為任何值。

trans-unit.source: It does not have to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 不必是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The URL to which the module should return upon authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證時模組應該傳回的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The WSFAM saves this value in the wctx parameter in the WS-Federation sign in request; however, the module does not use it when processing sign-in requests or sign-in responses.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 會將這個值儲存在 WS-同盟登入要求中的 wctx 參數，但是模組不會在處理登入要求或登入回應時使用該值。

trans-unit.source: You can set it either <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將它設定為 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a WS-Federation sign in request message by using the WS-Federation parameters configured on the module.
trans-unit.target: 使用模組上設定的 WS-Federation 參數，建立 WS-Federation 登入要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Federation sign-in request message.
trans-unit.target: WS-Federation 登入要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a WS-Federation sign-in request that is represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立由 WS-同盟登入要求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage>物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage> object are set as follows:
trans-unit.target: 新的屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage>物件設定如下：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Context%2A> property (the wctx parameter) is set to a value created by using the method parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Context%2A>屬性 （wctx 參數） 設定為建立使用的方法參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage.CurrentTime%2A> property (the wct parameter) is set to the current time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage.CurrentTime%2A>屬性 （wct 參數） 設定為目前的時間。

trans-unit.source: All other properties are set by using the equivalent properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前的執行個體的對等屬性會設定所有其他屬性。

trans-unit.source: The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞給方法的參數用來建立 wctx 訊息參數。

trans-unit.source: This is a string with the following format: `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`.
trans-unit.target: 這是以下列格式的字串： `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`。

trans-unit.source: The `ru` value is set to the value of the `returnUrl` parameter passed in to the method and it specifies the URL that the module should direct the browser to following successful authentication.
trans-unit.target: `ru`值設定的值為`returnUrl`參數中傳遞給方法，它會指定模組應該直接以下成功驗證瀏覽器的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This is the only value stored in the wctx string that is used by the WSFAM.
trans-unit.target: 這是唯一的值儲存在可由 WSFAM wctx 字串。

trans-unit.source: The module calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReturnUrlFromResponse%2A> method to extract this value from the wctx parameter when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response.
trans-unit.target: 此模組會呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReturnUrlFromResponse%2A>處理 WS-同盟登入回應時，從 wctx 參數擷取這個值的方法。

trans-unit.source: It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Reply%2A> property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response.
trans-unit.target: 不應混淆的 wreply 訊息參數，指定由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Reply%2A>屬性和其提供安全性權杖服務 (STS) 應該將其回應導向的 RP 的位址。

trans-unit.source: The `cx` parameter is set to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignInContext%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `cx`參數設定的值為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignInContext%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed to enable you to set any application-defined context that should be stored in the wctx string; however, WSFAM does not expose a method to extract this value in the response.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開可讓您設定要 wctx 字串; 字串中儲存任何應用程式定義的內容不過，WSFAM 未公開的方法，以擷取回應中的這個值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is needed by your application, you must provide the code to parse the wctx string and read this value when processing the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式，就需要這個值，您必須提供程式碼來剖析 wctx 字串和處理回應時讀取這個值。

trans-unit.source: You might accomplish this by overriding the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReturnUrlFromResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會完成此作業藉由覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReturnUrlFromResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Neither the `rm` value, which is set to the value of the `rememberMeSet` parameter, nor the `id` parameter, which is set to the value of the `uniqueId` parameter are used by WSFAM.
trans-unit.target: 既不`rm`值，設定的值為`rememberMeSet`參數，也不`id`參數，設定的值為`uniqueId`WSFAM 所使用參數。

trans-unit.source: These can be set to any value.
trans-unit.target: 這些可以設定為任何值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CreateSignInRequest%2A> method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CreateSignInRequest%2A>方法從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer" /> property is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Realm" /> property is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Realm" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the STS to receive the WS-Federation sign-out request message.
trans-unit.target: 要接收 WS-Federation 登出要求訊息的 STS 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 不可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL to be sent as the wreply value in the sign-out request message.
trans-unit.target: 要在登出要求訊息中以 wreply 值的方式傳送的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Signs out at the specified security token service (STS) by using the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WS-同盟通訊協定在指定的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 登出。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to send a WS-Federation sign-out request message to the specified STS.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法以傳送至指定的 STS WS-同盟登出要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally supply a value for the wreply parameter in the sign-out request.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地提供登出要求中 wreply 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The method does the following:
trans-unit.target: 方法會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a WS-Federation sign-out request message by using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的參數，以建立 WS-同盟登出要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the SAM to delete the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上刪除工作階段 cookie SAM 方法。

trans-unit.source: Redirects to the STS using the sign-out request message from the first step.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向至 STS 使用第一個步驟的登出要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: None of the sign-out events: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SigningOut>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedOut>, or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOutError> are raised by this method.
trans-unit.target: 沒有登出事件： <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SigningOut>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedOut>，或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOutError>由這個方法所引發。

trans-unit.source: To delete the session without sending a sign-out request message to the STS, call one of the overloaded <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除工作階段而不需要登出要求訊息傳送給 STS，請呼叫其中一個多載<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To perform passive sign-out by using the session token, the module relies on a value that was stored in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property during sign-in, for more information, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSessionTokenContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的工作階段權杖執行被動登出，模組會依賴值儲存於<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性在登入時，如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSessionTokenContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signOutUrl" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signOutUrl" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，也不是絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="replyUrl" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="replyUrl" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，也不是絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signOutUrl" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signOutUrl" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the wfresh parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests ("wsignin1.0").
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 WS-同盟登入要求 ("wsignin1.0") 中使用的 wfresh 參數值。

trans-unit.source: The desired maximum age of authentication requests, in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 所需的驗證要求最長使用期限，以分鐘為單位。

trans-unit.source: The wfresh parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: Wfresh 參數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Freshness%2A> property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wfresh parameter is not included in the sign-in request.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Freshness%2A>屬性設定為`null`或登入要求中未包含空字串，wfresh 參數。

trans-unit.source: You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由新增的處理常式覆寫這項設定在每個 HTTP 要求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message.
trans-unit.target: 只在模組重新導向至與 WS-同盟登入要求訊息的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 之前，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The STS is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所指定 STS<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The issuer address.
trans-unit.target: 簽發者位址。

trans-unit.source: The address of the security token service (STS) to which to direct the request.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的位址，要將要求導向此位址。

trans-unit.source: A URL that specifies the address to return to after sign-out. This sets the wreply parameter in the sign-out request.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在登出後返回之位址的 URL。這會在登出要求中設定 wreply 參數。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" /> or empty if no wreply parameter should be included in the generated sign-out request.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有應該包含在產生之登出要求中的 wreply 參數，則可以是 <see langword="null" /> 或空白。

trans-unit.source: This should be an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 這應該是絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Additional query string parameters to be included in the sign-out request.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在登出要求中的其他查詢字串參數。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" /> or empty if no additional to be parameters included in the generated sign-out request.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他要包含在產生之登出要求中的參數，則可以是 <see langword="null" /> 或空白。

trans-unit.source: This should be a relative URI.
trans-unit.target: 這應該為相對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns a URL that represents a WS-Federation sign-out request addressed to the specified issuer and that contains the specified wreply parameter and the specified additional parameters.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 URL，代表對指定簽發者發出的 WS-同登出要求，且包含指定的 wreply 參數及指定的其他參數。

trans-unit.source: A URL that contains a WS-Federation passive sign-out request that is built by using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含使用指定之參數所建立之 WS-Federation 被動登出要求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: In the URL that is returned: the base URI is set to `issuer`; the wa parameter is set to "wsignout1.0"; the wreply parameter is set to `signOutReply`; and the parameters specified in `signOutQueryString` are present as additional query string parameters.
trans-unit.target: 會傳回在 URL 中： 基底 URI 設定為`issuer`wa 參數設定為"wsignout1.0"; wreply 參數設定為`signOutReply`; 中指定的參數和`signOutQueryString`會呈現為其他查詢字串參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="issuer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="issuer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL that specifies the address of the issuance result.
trans-unit.target: 會指定發行結果的位址的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets the issuance result (typically the issued token) from the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 URL 取得發行結果 (通常是發出的權杖)。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the URL specified in the wresultptr parameter in a sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 解析登入回應訊息中的 wresultptr 參數中指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The issuance result that was referenced by the URL.
trans-unit.target: URL 所參考的發行結果。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetXmlTokenFromMessage%28System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method from inside the processing pipeline to resolve the URL specified in the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message received from a security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 由呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetXmlTokenFromMessage%28System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>內處理管線的解析 URL 收到來自安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的登入回應訊息中 wresultptr 參數中指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: By default this method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 依預設這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a derived class to support the wresultptr parameter.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法在衍生的類別，以支援 wresultptr 參數。

trans-unit.source: The URL points to the issuance result, which should be one of the following: a `<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse>` element, a `<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponseCollection>` element, a SOAP response, or a SOAP `<S:Fault>` element.
trans-unit.target: URL 指向發行結果，也應為下列其中一項：`<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse>`項目，`<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponseCollection>`項目、 SOAP 回應或 SOAP`<S:Fault>`項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別中不支援此方法。

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在衍生類別中覆寫它。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request that contains a form POST, which contains the WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 包含表單張貼的 HTTP 要求，這項張貼則包含 WS-同盟登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the URL of the page that was originally requested from the sign-in response.
trans-unit.target: 擷取原來從登入回應中要求之頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page that was originally requested by the client.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端原先要求之頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This is the URL (at the relying party) to which the client should be redirected following successful sign-in.
trans-unit.target: 這是用戶端在成功登入後應重新導向到的 URL (在信賴憑證者)。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the request processing pipeline (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method) to get the URL of the page at the relying party (RP) to direct the client to after successful sign-in.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫從要求處理管線 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>方法) 以取得在信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP) 將用戶端導向網頁的 URL 之後成功登入。

trans-unit.source: This is, typically, the URL of the RP resource to which the client originally requested access.
trans-unit.target: 這是，一般而言，RP 的用戶端原先要求資源存取的 URL。

trans-unit.source: By default, WSFAM saves the return URL inside the wctx message parameter when it sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，WSFAM 將 WS-同盟登入要求傳送給安全性權杖服務 (STS) 時，儲存內 wctx 訊息參數的傳回 URL。

trans-unit.source: In accordance with the WS-Federation specification, the wctx parameter is preserved across entities through which the message passes and is returned unaltered in the WS-Federation sign-in response message that is sent by the STS.
trans-unit.target: 根據 WS-同盟規格，wctx 參數會保留的實體透過此訊息傳遞，而且是透過 WS-同盟登入回應訊息中傳送的 STS 原封不動地傳回。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation gets the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會從 wctx 參數登入回應中取得的傳回 URL。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the format of the wctx parameter that is used by WSFAM, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CreateSignInRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 正由 WSFAM wctx 參數的格式的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CreateSignInRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads a security token from the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的要求讀取安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The sign-in response message from which to read the token.
trans-unit.target: 從中讀取權杖的登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Reads a security token from the specified WS Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 WS 同盟登入回應訊息讀取安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The security token that was read from the message.
trans-unit.target: 已從訊息讀取的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetXmlTokenFromMessage%28System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get the token and reads it by using the appropriate handler from the configured security token handlers.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetXmlTokenFromMessage%28System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來取得權杖，並讀取使用適當的處理常式中設定的安全性權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="message" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request from which to read the token.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中讀取語彙基元的 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: Reads a security token from the specified HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 HTTP 要求讀取安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The security token that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Called from the request processing pipeline to get the WS-Federation sign-in request message as a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 要求處理管線，以取得做為 WS-同盟登入要求訊息從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSignInResponseMessage%2A> method to get a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage> object and then invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSecurityToken%28System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSignInResponseMessage%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage>物件，然後再叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSecurityToken%28System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載。

trans-unit.source: Use a derived class to interpret a specific type of request.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用衍生的類別來解譯特定類型的要求。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that should be persisted with the session cookie in the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，這個值應該與工作階段 cookie 保存在 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context" /> 屬性中。

trans-unit.source: The string to persist in the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 要保存在工作階段 Cookie 中的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSessionTokenContext%2A> method is called from the request processing pipeline when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message to get the value to store in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property inside the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSessionTokenContext%2A>處理 WS-同盟登入回應訊息，取得要在儲存的值時，方法從要求處理管線呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性內的工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to provide an application-specific value to be stored in the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法以提供特定應用程式的值儲存在 cookie 中。

trans-unit.source: WSFAM does not expose any methods to retrieve the value from the cookie.
trans-unit.target: WSFAM 未公開任何方法來擷取 cookie 的值。

trans-unit.source: You must provide the logic in your application to read the value back from the cookie if it is needed.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供邏輯讀取傳回的 cookie 的值，如果需要在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request from which to read the sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 從中讀取登入回應訊息的 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: The request should represent a form POST.
trans-unit.target: 要求應該會表示表單 POST。

trans-unit.source: Reads a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage" /> object from the form POST represented by the specified HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 HTTP 要求所代表的表單 POST 讀取 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The sign-in response message that was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立的登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSecurityToken%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in the request processing pipeline to get a sign-in response message from the form POST contained in the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSecurityToken%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>要求處理管線，以取得從表單 POST HTTP 要求中所含的登入回應訊息中的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A sign-in response message could not be read from the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 無法從指定的要求讀取登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: The sign-out clean-up request.
trans-unit.target: 登出清除要求。

trans-unit.source: Determines the URL to which to redirect when processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (wsignoutcleanup1.0) that contains a wreply parameter.
trans-unit.target: 決定處理包含 wreply 參數的 WS-Federation 登出清除要求 (wsignoutcleanup1.0) 時要重新導向到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to redirect to.
trans-unit.target: 要重新導向的目的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%2A> method in the request processing pipeline to determine the URL to redirect to after processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%2A>判定之後處理 WS-同盟登出清除要求重新導向至 URL 的要求處理管線中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It is only invoked if the message has a wreply parameter (the `signOutMessage` parameter has a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Reply%2A> property that is neither `null` nor empty).
trans-unit.target: 它才會叫用如果訊息具有 wreply 參數 (`signOutMessage`參數具有<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Reply%2A>，既不是屬性`null`或空白)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation validates the reply URL contained in the message (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Reply%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property) against the address of the security token service (STS) that is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會驗證訊息中包含的回覆 URL (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Reply%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性) 對安全性權杖服務 (STS) 所指定的位址<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be true for the reply URL to be valid:
trans-unit.target: 下列條件必須是有效的回覆 url，則為 true:

trans-unit.source: The reply URL is an absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: 回覆 URL 是絕對 URL。

trans-unit.source: The reply URL has the same scheme as the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 回覆 URL 有簽發者相同的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The reply URL has the same port as the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 回覆 URL 有簽發者相同的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: Either the reply URL has the same host as the issuer or the reply URL specifies a sub-domain of the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 回覆 URL 已簽發者相同的主控件，或回覆 URL 指定簽發者的子網域。

trans-unit.source: If all of these conditions are true, the reply URL (Reply) is returned; otherwise, the URL specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果下列所有條件都不成立，就會傳回回覆 URL （回覆）;否則，根據指定的 URL<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>會傳回屬性。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide additional validation for the reply URL.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供額外的驗證回覆 URL。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signOutMessage" /> has a <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Reply" /> property that is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signOutMessage" /> 具有 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Reply" /> 屬性，此屬性為 <see langword="null" /> 或空的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="signOutMessage" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signOutMessage" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the issued token from the specified WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 WS 同盟登入回應訊息擷取發行的權杖。

trans-unit.source: The sign-in response message to extract the token from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取權杖的登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: The sign-in response contains the token issued by the STS.
trans-unit.target: 登入回應會包含 STS 簽發的權杖。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the issued token from the specified WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 WS 同盟登入回應訊息擷取發行的權杖。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the XML that represents the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含表示已發佈之語彙基元的 XML。

trans-unit.source: This is a <see langword="<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 這是 <see langword="<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: If there is no wresult parameter in the sign-in response message, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReferencedResult%2A> method is called to try to get the token using the wresultptr parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果登入回應訊息中，沒有 wresult 參數<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReferencedResult%2A>呼叫方法，嘗試取得權杖使用 wresultptr 參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="message" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="message" /> does not contain a token.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 不包含語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: (It does not contain a valid wresult or wresultptr parameter.)
trans-unit.target: (它不會包含有效的 wresult 或 wresultptr 參數)。

trans-unit.source: The sign-in response message to extract the token from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取權杖的登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: The sign-in response contains the token issued by the STS.
trans-unit.target: 登入回應會包含 STS 簽發的權杖。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Federation serializer to use to de-serialize the sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 要用來還原序列化登入回應訊息的 WS-同盟序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the issued token from the specified WS-Federation sign-in response message by using the specified WS-Federation serializer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 WS-同盟序列化程式，從指定的 WS-同盟登入回應訊息中擷取發行的權杖。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the XML that represents the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含表示已發佈之語彙基元的 XML。

trans-unit.source: This is a <see langword="<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 這是 <see langword="<wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="message" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the whr parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests ("wsignin1.0").
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 WS-同盟登入要求 ("wsignin1.0") 中使用的 whr 參數值。

trans-unit.source: The address of the identity provider.
trans-unit.target: 識別提供者的位址。

trans-unit.source: The whr parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: Whr 參數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.HomeRealm%2A> property is set to `null` or an empty string, the whr parameter is not included in the sign-in request.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.HomeRealm%2A>屬性設定為`null`或登入要求中未包含空字串，whr 參數。

trans-unit.source: You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由新增的處理常式覆寫這項設定在每個 HTTP 要求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message.
trans-unit.target: 只在模組重新導向至與 WS-同盟登入要求訊息的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 之前，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The STS is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所指定 STS<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP application object that contains this module.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個模組的 HTTP 應用程式物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the module and prepares it to handle events from the module's [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] application object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化模組，並做準備以處理來自模組之 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 應用程式物件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds handlers for ASP.NET pipeline events according to the following table.
trans-unit.target: 將根據下表的 ASP.NET 管線事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Handler
trans-unit.target: 處理常式

trans-unit.source: The module properties, such as <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> , are initialized from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 模組屬性，例如<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>，初始化自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the module properties based on the configuration specified by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration" /> property of the module.
trans-unit.target: 根據模組的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration" /> 屬性所指定的組態，初始化模組屬性。

trans-unit.source: Module properties are initialized using the equivalent properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration> object specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.WsFederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 模組屬性會使用對等的屬性初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WsFederationConfiguration>所指定物件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.WsFederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can specify settings in a configuration file through the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過組態檔中指定設定[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 連入的 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified request is a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的要求是否為 WS-Federation 登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the request is a WS-Federation sign-in response message; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求是 WS-Federation 登入回應訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%2A> method in the request processing pipeline to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a WS-Federation sign-in response message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%2A>要求處理管線，以判斷連入 HTTP 要求是否為 WS-同盟登入回應訊息中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns `true` if the wa parameter is "wsignin1.0" and the wreq and wreqptr parameters are not both set.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回`true`如果 wa 參數是"wsignin1.0 」 和 wreq，且不能同時設定 wreqptr 參數。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in derived classes to perform additional validation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法在衍生類別來執行額外的驗證。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URI that identifies the intended issuer of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 URI，識別想要的安全性權杖簽發者。

trans-unit.source: The URI that identifies the security token service (STS).
trans-unit.target: 會識別安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This is a required property.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It must be set if passive redirects are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用被動重新導向，則必須設定。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the URL of the security token service (STS) to which WS-Federation requests should be issued.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定 WS-同盟要求應該發行安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由新增的處理常式覆寫這項設定在每個 HTTP 要求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message.
trans-unit.target: 只在模組重新導向至與 WS-同盟登入要求訊息的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 之前，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The STS is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所指定 STS<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.Issuer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> or an empty string occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An attempt to set the property to a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設為不是有效的絕對 URI 的值。

trans-unit.source: The source for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: This will be an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個將會是 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest" /> event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 處理來自 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 管線的 <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method implements the WS-Federation request processing pipeline.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>方法會實作 WS-同盟要求處理管線。

trans-unit.source: It is added to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> event in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它會加入至<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的事件[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]由管線<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The method performs the following:
trans-unit.target: 此方法會執行下列作業：

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29> method to determine whether a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") has been received.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29>方法，以判斷是否已經接收到的 WS-同盟登入回應訊息 (「 wsignin1.0")。

trans-unit.source: If the response is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29> processes the message, terminates the request and redirects the client according to the WS-Federation parameters in the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果回應的 WS-同盟登出清除要求 (「 wsignoutcleanup1.0 」)<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CanReadSignInResponse%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29>處理訊息，終止要求，並在要求中的 WS-同盟參數根據用戶端重新導向。

trans-unit.source: If the message is not a sign-in response or a sign-out clean-up request, the module just returns; otherwise it performs the following steps to process the sign-in response.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息不是登入回應或登出清除要求中，模組只會傳回。否則，它會執行下列步驟來處理登入回應。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSecurityToken%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29> method to deserialize a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object from the request.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetSecurityToken%28System.Web.HttpRequestBase%29>方法還原序列化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>從要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenReceived> 事件。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel further processing or modify the received security token in a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消進一步處理，或修改此事件處理常式中接收的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A handler is typically used to modify the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式通常用來修改<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Validates the security token and creates a <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> object from the claims in the security token.
trans-unit.target: 驗證安全性權杖，並建立<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>從安全性權杖中宣告的物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenValidated> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenValidated> 事件。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel further processing or modify the claims principal in a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消進一步處理，或修改此事件處理常式中的宣告主體。

trans-unit.source: Uses the configured session authentication module (SAM) to create a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立使用設定的工作階段驗證模組 (SAM)<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>物件。

trans-unit.source: (The configured SAM is the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> object returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.SessionAuthenticationModule%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.) The session token is created by using the claims principal returned in step 5.
trans-unit.target: (在設定 sam<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>所傳回物件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.SessionAuthenticationModule%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。)使用在步驟 5 中所傳回宣告主體建立的工作階段權杖。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties are set by using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> returned in step 3 and are validated against the current time and the token lifetime specified by either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A> or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> object in the token handler collection being used by WSFAM.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性使用設定的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>在步驟 3 傳回與目前時間與任一所指定的權杖存留期會驗證<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>WSFAM 正在使用的語彙基元處理常式集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The token lifetime on the session token handler can be specified in configuration through the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 權杖存留期在工作階段權杖處理常式可以透過組態中指定[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: Note: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.PersistentSessionLifetime%2A> property on the cookie handler configured for the SAM is not used.
trans-unit.target: 注意：<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.PersistentSessionLifetime%2A>屬性上設定不會使用 SAM cookie 處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalAndWriteSessionToken%2A> method with the session token to write the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalAndWriteSessionToken%2A>方法包含用來撰寫工作階段 cookie 工作階段 token。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalAndWriteSessionToken%2A> method first raises the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalAndWriteSessionToken%2A>第一個方法會引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can change properties on the session token or change whether the cookie should be persisted in a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更工作階段權杖上的屬性，或變更是否應該保存 cookie，此事件處理常式中。

trans-unit.source: After the event is raised, the method then writes the cookie using the SAM.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件之後，方法會再寫入使用 SAM 的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> set in configuration is not used to write the cookie.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>組態的設定不會用來撰寫 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnSignedIn%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedIn> event.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnSignedIn%2A>方法，以引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SignedIn>事件。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReturnUrlFromResponse%2A> method to get the RP page to which to redirect the client.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.GetReturnUrlFromResponse%2A>方法來取得要用戶端重新導向至 [RP] 頁面。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method reads the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會讀取 wctx 參數，在登入回應中傳回的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how WSFAM stores the return URL, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CreateSignInRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何 WSFAM 儲存傳回 URL 的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.CreateSignInRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnEndRequest%2A> event-handler delegate when authorization has failed.
trans-unit.target: 從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.OnEndRequest%2A>授權失敗時，事件處理常式委派。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property before raising the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed> event to prevent circular redirects if the user has already been authenticated.
